h1: How Many Calories in a Twisted Tea?

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz bottle of Twisted Tea Original has 144 kcal, mostly from carbs and alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Twisted Tea Original?
Does Twisted Tea have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, around 13.5 g carbs and 13.5 g sugars per bottle from the sweetened tea.

faqs.q: Is Twisted Tea low in fat or protein?
faqs.a: It has 0 g fat and 0 g protein per serving.

faqs.q: How does Twisted Tea compare to beer calories?
faqs.a: Similar to a light beer at 144 kcal, but with more sugars and tea flavor.

faqs.q: Are there lower calorie Twisted Tea options?
faqs.a: Yes, Twisted Tea Light has about 72 kcal per bottle.
